support-us.polkastats_software_TEXT: PolkaStats software is open source and the services hosted at https: //polkastats.io are provided for free (as in free beer).
support-us.i_enjoy_developing_TEXT: I enjoy developing PolkaStats and providing the services without annoying ads and I plan to continue doing it in that way :-).
support-us.if_you_like_TEXT: If you like my work and want to support the hosting payments or the time I spend developing and maintaining the server, you can do it in several ways.
support-us.we_love_feedback_TEXT: We love getting feedback from the community, if you find a bug, want to comment some behaviour or want a feature being added please place an Issue in our
support-us.this_is_an_TEXT: This is an easy way you can support me and the Polkadot folks at
support-us.are_you_a_TEXT: Are you a happy PolkaStats user? Make sure you follow
support-us.on_twitter_to_get_TEXT: on Twitter to get the last platform updates
